content:
TITLE: Installing Resend SDK DESCRIPTION: Instructions for installing the Resend package using npm or yarn package managers. SOURCE: https://github.com/resend/resend-node/blob/canary/readme.md#2025-04-13_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install resend # or yarn add resend ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing Resend Client DESCRIPTION: Setup code for initializing the Resend client with an API key. SOURCE: https://github.com/resend/resend-node/blob/canary/readme.md#2025-04-13_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Resend } from 'resend'; const resend = new Resend('re_123456789'); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Email with React Template DESCRIPTION: Example of sending an email using a React component template with props. SOURCE: https://github.com/resend/resend-node/blob/canary/readme.md#2025-04-13_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import EmailTemplate from '../components/EmailTemplate'; await resend.emails.send({ from: 'you@example.com', to: 'user@gmail.com', replyTo: 'you@example.com', subject: 'hello world', react: , }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating React Email Template DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a React component for use as an email template with dynamic props. SOURCE: https://github.com/resend/resend-node/blob/canary/readme.md#2025-04-13_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import React from 'react'; export default function EmailTemplate({ firstName, product }) { return (

Welcome, {firstName}!

Thanks for trying {product}. We're thrilled to have you on board.

); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending HTML Email DESCRIPTION: Example of sending an email with HTML content using the Resend API. SOURCE: https://github.com/resend/resend-node/blob/canary/readme.md#2025-04-13_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` await resend.emails.send({ from: 'you@example.com', to: 'user@gmail.com', replyTo: 'you@example.com', subject: 'hello world', html: 'it works!', }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Plain Text Email DESCRIPTION: Example of sending a basic plain text email using the Resend API. SOURCE: https://github.com/resend/resend-node/blob/canary/readme.md#2025-04-13_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` await resend.emails.send({ from: 'you@example.com', to: 'user@gmail.com', replyTo: 'you@example.com', subject: 'hello world', text: 'it works!', }); ```
